title: Introducing: Bury The Wren
body:
Really glad that Philadelphia’s **Bury The Wren** (Erica Gibson, Scott Stallone) cropped up on my radar earlier this month.

Their debut EP, **_2:15 to New Glory_**, is a glorious trip-hop influenced journey, drawing from the likes of Massive Attack and most notably, Portishead. Check out a couple of EP highlights below, including the epic _I’m Happy_.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
